qas.question: What is it called when higher ups in government embezzle from the government's treasury?
What examples of natural resources do some corrupt officials in government take?
Some corrupt governments use what type of money coming in?
Foreign aid money is sometimes used to build fancy structures and to buy what?

context: If the highest echelons of the governments also take advantage from corruption or embezzlement from the state's treasury, it is sometimes referred with the neologism <a0_0>kleptocracy<a0_0/>. Members of the government can take advantage of the natural resources (e.g., <a1_0>diamonds and oil<a1_0/> in a few prominent cases) or state-owned productive industries. A number of corrupt governments have enriched themselves via <a2_0>foreign aid<a2_0/>, which is often spent on showy buildings and <a3_0>armaments<a3_0/>.
